scripts.build:js: cd js && uglifyjs blueimp-helper.js blueimp-gallery.js blueimp-gallery-fullscreen.js blueimp-gallery-indicator.js blueimp-gallery-video.js blueimp-gallery-vimeo.js blueimp-gallery-youtube.js --ie8 -c -m -o blueimp-gallery.min.js --source-map url=blueimp-gallery.min.js.map
scripts.build:jquery: cd js && uglifyjs blueimp-gallery.js blueimp-gallery-fullscreen.js blueimp-gallery-indicator.js blueimp-gallery-video.js blueimp-gallery-vimeo.js blueimp-gallery-youtube.js jquery.blueimp-gallery.js --ie8 -c -m -o jquery.blueimp-gallery.min.js --source-map url=jquery.blueimp-gallery.min.js.map
scripts.build:css: cd css && cleancss -c ie7 --source-map -o blueimp-gallery.min.css blueimp-gallery.css blueimp-gallery-indicator.css blueimp-gallery-video.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:jquery && npm run build:css
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A js css
scripts.postversion: git push --tags origin master master:gh-pages && npm publish
